text: The Berenstain Bears are a group of fictional bears from movies and books. They were created by Stan and Jan Berenstain. The bears learn safety and morality lessons in every story. Issues in the stories include childhood obesity, bullying and online safety. The Berenstain Bears have been popular for many years. The stories have been criticized for being too sentimental and too predictable. Category:Fictional bears Category:Anthromophic characters Category:Fictional families
title: Berenstain Bears
